metadata.title: CVE-2024-26779 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: mac80211: fix race condition on enabling fast-xmitfast-xmit must only be enabled after the sta has been uploaded to thedriver,otherwise it could end up passing the not-yet-uploaded sta via drv_tx callsto the driver, leading to potential crashes because of uninitializeddrv_privdata.Add a missing sta->uploaded check and re-check fast xmit after inserting asta.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
